query.statement:
WITH PPT4 AS ( SELECT PP004.WOKNUM AS HOGIN ,(SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MS001 WHERE MS001.MANDT=PP004.MANDT AND MS001.POSID=PP004.POSID) AS SITE_NM ,MS002.ZSPEC1 AS SPEC1 ,MS002.ZSPEC2 AS SPEC2 ,PP004.MATNR AS MATNR ,PP004.IDNRK AS IDNRK ,PP004.ITEM_SEQ AS ITEM_SEQ ,PP004.MAKTX AS MAKTX ,PP004.MAKTX AS MATNR_NM --CASE WHEN MM011.MATNR_NM='' THEN MM011.MAKTX ELSE MM011.MATNR_NM END AS MATNR_NM ,MM011.MTART AS MTART ,PP004.SPEC AS SPEC ,PP004.ZSIZE AS SIZE ,MM011.EXTWG AS EXTWG ,MM011.EXTWG2 AS EXTWG2 ,'신박스' AS BOXCK -- 진행박스란에 신박스로 조회되도록 수정 2015.08.06 조영욱 -- VALUE((SELECT CASE WHEN M085A.BOX_CK = '24' THEN '신박스' ELSE '구박스' END -- FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT085 AS M085A -- WHERE M085A.MANDT = PP004.MANDT -- AND M085A.POSID2 = PP004.WOKNUM),'구박스') AS BOXCK ,PP004.MENGE AS MENGE ,PP004.MEINS AS MEINS ,PP004.DZEINR AS DZEINR ,PP004.MATKL AS MATKL ,PP004.UPMATKL AS UPMATKL ,PP004.VERSION AS VERSION ,PP004.BOM_LEVEL AS BOM_LEVEL ,PP004.CRUSER AS CRUSER ,PP004.CRDAT AS CRDAT ,PP004.CRTIM AS CRTIM ,PP004.PART AS PART ,CASE WHEN PP004.PART=11 THEN '기계-구조물' WHEN PP004.PART=12 THEN '기계-의장' WHEN PP004.PART=21 THEN '전기-CP' WHEN PP004.PART=22 THEN '전기-의장' WHEN PP004.PART=23 THEN '전기-CABLE' WHEN PP004.PART=50 THEN '주차' WHEN PP004.PART=60 THEN 'E/S,M/W' WHEN PP004.PART=70 THEN '물류' ELSE '' END AS PART_NM ,CASE PP004.PRCTYP WHEN 'C' THEN '변경' WHEN 'D' THEN '삭제' WHEN 'N' THEN '추가' ELSE '' END AS PRCTYP ,PP004.PRCTYP AS PRC_ORG ,PP004.MANDT AS MANDT FROM (
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.CRDAT ,A.SEQNO ,A.WOKNUM ,A.MATNR ,A.IDNRK ,A.ITEM_SEQ ,A.MENGE ,A.MEINS ,A.MATKL ,A.UPMATKL ,B.DZEINR ,A.PRCTYP ,A.VERSION ,A.BOM_LEVEL ,A.CRUSER ,A.CRTIM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.MATKL ORDER BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.CRDAT DESC,A.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,3,6) WHEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,2,6) ELSE SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,6) END AS POSID ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,3,9) WHEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(WOKNUM,2,9) ELSE SUBSTR(WOKNUM,1,9) END AS POSID_1 ,CASE WHEN ZPART='M' THEN 11 WHEN ZPART='C' THEN 12 WHEN ZPART='1' THEN 21 WHEN ZPART='2' THEN 22 WHEN ZPART='3' THEN 23 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='5' THEN 50 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='6' THEN 60 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='7' THEN 70 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='1' THEN 11 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='2' THEN 21 WHEN SUBSTR(MATKL,2,1)='3' THEN 12 ELSE 90 END AS PART ,B.MAKTX ,B.SPEC ,B.ZSIZE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT007 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.IDNRK = B.MATNR AND A.MATKL = B.ITEMNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.WOKNUM LIKE #PJT#||'%' AND LENGTH(CAST(#PJT# AS VARCHAR(15))) >= 6 AND B.CRDAT = ( SELECT MAX(CRDAT) FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT007 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND MATNR = B.MATNR AND ITEMNO = B.ITEMNO )
UNION -- 1 LEVEL 자재인 경우, 2 LEVEL 자재도 선택
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.CRDAT ,A.SEQNO ,A.WOKNUM ,A.MATNR ,A.IDNRK ,A.ITEM_SEQ ,A.MENGE ,A.MEINS ,A.MATKL ,A.UPMATKL ,B.DZEINR ,A.PRCTYP ,A.VERSION ,A.BOM_LEVEL ,A.CRUSER ,A.CRTIM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.MATKL ORDER BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.CRDAT DESC,A.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,3,6) WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,2,6) ELSE SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,6) END AS POSID ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,3,9) WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,2,9) ELSE SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,9) END AS POSID_1 ,CASE WHEN A.ZPART='M' THEN 11 WHEN A.ZPART='C' THEN 12 WHEN A.ZPART='1' THEN 21 WHEN A.ZPART='2' THEN 22 WHEN A.ZPART='3' THEN 23 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='5' THEN 50 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='6' THEN 60 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='7' THEN 70 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='1' THEN 11 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='2' THEN 21 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='3' THEN 12 ELSE 90 END AS PART ,B.MAKTX ,B.SPEC ,B.ZSIZE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT007 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.IDNRK = B.MATNR AND A.MATKL = B.ITEMNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.WOKNUM LIKE #PJT#||'%' AND LENGTH(CAST(#PJT# AS VARCHAR(15))) >= 6 AND A.BOM_LEVEL = '02' AND B.CRDAT = ( SELECT MAX(CRDAT) FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT007 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND MATNR = B.MATNR AND ITEMNO = B.ITEMNO )
UNION -- 2 LEVEL 자재인 경우, 1 LEVEL 자재도 선택
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.CRDAT ,A.SEQNO ,A.WOKNUM ,A.MATNR ,A.IDNRK ,A.ITEM_SEQ ,A.MENGE ,A.MEINS ,A.MATKL ,A.UPMATKL ,B.DZEINR ,A.PRCTYP ,A.VERSION ,A.BOM_LEVEL ,A.CRUSER ,A.CRTIM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.MATKL ORDER BY A.MANDT,A.WOKNUM,A.MATNR,A.IDNRK,A.ITEM_SEQ,A.CRDAT DESC,A.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,3,6) WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,2,6) ELSE SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,6) END AS POSID ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,3,9) WHEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,2,9) ELSE SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,9) END AS POSID_1 ,CASE WHEN A.ZPART='M' THEN 11 WHEN A.ZPART='C' THEN 12 WHEN A.ZPART='1' THEN 21 WHEN A.ZPART='2' THEN 22 WHEN A.ZPART='3' THEN 23 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='5' THEN 50 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='6' THEN 60 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='7' THEN 70 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='1' THEN 11 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='2' THEN 21 WHEN SUBSTR(A.MATKL,2,1)='3' THEN 12 ELSE 90 END AS PART ,B.MAKTX ,B.SPEC ,B.ZSIZE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT007 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.IDNRK = B.MATNR AND A.MATKL = B.ITEMNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.WOKNUM LIKE #PJT#||'%' AND LENGTH(CAST(#PJT# AS VARCHAR(15))) >= 6 AND A.IDNRK IN (
SELECT DISTINCT MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WOKNUM LIKE #PJT#||'%' AND LENGTH(CAST(#PJT# AS VARCHAR(15))) >= 6 AND BOM_LEVEL = '02'
) --AND B.CRDAT = ( SELECT MAX(CRDAT) FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT007 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND MATNR = B.MATNR AND ITEMNO = B.ITEMNO) AND B.CRDAT = VALUE(( SELECT MAX(CRDAT) FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT007 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND MATNR = B.MATNR AND ITEMNO = B.ITEMNO),'')
) AS PP004 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MS002 ON MS002.MANDT=PP004.MANDT AND MS002.POSID=PP004.POSID AND MS002.POSID_1=PP004.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM011.MANDT=PP004.MANDT AND MM011.MATNR=PP004.IDNRK
WHERE ROWNO=1 AND PART > 0 --전체
)
SELECT A.HOGIN AS HOGIN ,A.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM ,A.SPEC1 AS SPEC1 ,A.SPEC2 AS SPEC2 ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,A.IDNRK AS IDNRK ,A.ITEM_SEQ AS ITEM_SEQ ,A.MAKTX AS MAKTX ,A.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM ,A.MTART AS MTART ,A.SPEC AS SPEC ,A.SIZE AS SIZE ,A.EXTWG AS EXTWG ,A.EXTWG2 AS EXTWG2 ,A.BOXCK AS BOXCK ,A.MENGE AS MENGE ,A.MEINS AS MEINS ,A.DZEINR AS DZEINR ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.UPMATKL AS UPMATKL ,A.VERSION AS VERSION ,A.BOM_LEVEL AS BOM_LEVEL ,A.CRUSER AS CRUSER ,A.CRDAT AS CRDAT ,A.CRTIM AS CRTIM ,A.PART AS PART ,A.PART_NM AS PART_NM ,CASE WHEN A.PRC_ORG= 'D' THEN '삭제' WHEN VALUE((SELECT DISTINCT B.PRC_ORG FROM PPT4 B WHERE B.HOGIN = A.HOGIN AND B.IDNRK = A.MATNR AND B.MATKL = A.MATKL),'') = 'D' THEN '삭제' ELSE A.PRCTYP END AS PRCTYP ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(MM013.LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 WHERE MM013.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MM013.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,7,2) IN ('NS','NB','NC') OR SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,1,1) = 'Q' THEN A.HOGIN ELSE A.HOGIN || '-P' END) AND MM013.MATNR = A.IDNRK AND MM013.DDATE IN ('00000000','')),'') AS LIFNR ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(MM013.LNAME) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 WHERE MM013.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MM013.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,7,2) IN ('NS','NB','NC') OR SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,1,1) = 'Q' THEN A.HOGIN ELSE A.HOGIN || '-P' END) AND MM013.MATNR = A.IDNRK AND MM013.DDATE IN ('00000000','')),'') AS LNAME ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(MM013.EKGRP) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 WHERE MM013.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MM013.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,7,2) IN ('NS','NB','NC') OR SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,1,1) = 'Q' THEN A.HOGIN ELSE A.HOGIN || '-P' END) AND MM013.MATNR = A.IDNRK AND MM013.DDATE IN ('00000000','')),'') AS EKGRP ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(T024.EKTEL) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 as mm013 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.T024 AS T024 ON MM013.MANDT = T024.MANDT AND MM013.EKGRP = T024.EKGRP WHERE MM013.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MM013.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,7,2) IN ('NS','NB','NC') OR SUBSTR(A.HOGIN,1,1) = 'Q' THEN A.HOGIN ELSE A.HOGIN || '-P' END) AND MM013.MATNR = A.IDNRK AND MM013.DDATE IN ('00000000','')),'') AS EKTEL
FROM PPT4 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SPEC = 'ANCHOR HOOK' ORDER BY HOGIN,PART,MATKL,BOM_LEVEL,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,MATKL FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
